TextLang.Text: Dane zostanà usuniète. Czy na pewno chcesz kontynuowaá?
Usuwanie nie powiodło siè. Karta Memory Stick™ jest zablokowana.
Karta Memory Stick™ nie mogła zostaá odczytana.
Pamièá systemu nie mogła zostaá odczytana.
Karta Memory Stick™ nie została włoäona.
Na karcie Memory Stick™ jest za mało wolnego miejsca.
W pamièci systemu jest za mało wolnego miejsca.
Gra nie mogła zostaá uruchomiona. Dane zostały uszkodzone.
Nie moäna uruchomiá gry poprzez jej dane.
Gra nie mogła zostaá uruchomiona. System memory is low.
Gra nie mogła zostaá uruchomiona. Kod regionu jest niepoprawny.
Wersja systemu twojego PSP™ wynosi %1. Nie ma potrzeby aktualizacji.
Brak gier. Zawartoãá moäe zostaá kupiona i pobrana z PlayStation®Store.
Nie moäna uäywaá tej zawartoãci podczas wyãwietlania obrazu na podłaczonym ekranie. Switch to display video output on the PSP™ system.
Wersja systemu twojego PSP™ wynosi %1. Aby uruchomiá, potrzeba wersji %2 lub nowszej. Czy chcesz zaktualizowaá teraz?
You will need to update before your next use.

The version of the application software is %1.
You can check the latest version at the website listed below. %2 Do you want to start the Internet browser and open this website?
The Bluetooth® connection must be temporarily disabled. Do you want to disable it now?

To use accessories that require a USB connection, [Bluetooth® Connection] under [Settings] > [Bluetooth® Device Settings] must be set to [Off]. Do you want to set [Bluetooth® Connection] to [Off] now?
If you perform the update, the data for [Resume Game] will be deleted. Are you sure you want to continue?
Note that the current data for [Resume Game] will be overwritten if you select [Pause Game] during this game.
The download failed. A DNS error has occurred.
The download failed. A connection to the HTTP proxy server could not be established.
The download failed. A connection to the server could not be established.
The update cannot be started. The update data is not applicable for this system.
The update cannot be started. You must use update data that is compatible with the model in use. For details, visit the Sony Computer Entertainment Web site for your region.
Kopiowanie do pamièci systemu... Proszè czekaá.
Kopiowanie do karty Memory Stick™... Proszè czekaá.
The content is not available before the start date.
The content has expired and is no longer available.
This content has a time limit. Go to [Settings] > [Date & Time Settings] > [Date and Time], and select [Set via Internet] to set the date and time.
Informacje o prawach autorskich sà niepoprawne.
Dane nie mogły zostaá skopiowane. Dane sà uszkodzone.
Games, game data and saved data must be saved in the same location. If you copy a game, the game data and the saved data for the game must also be copied to the Memory Stick™.
Games, game data and saved data must be saved in the same location. If you copy a game, the game data and the saved data for the game must also be copied to the system storage.
Kopiowanie ukoâczone. Czy chcesz usunàc grè z karty Memory Stick™?
Kopiowanie ukoâczone. Czy chcesz usunàc grè z pamièci systemu?
Kopiowanie nie powiodło siè. Gra z tà samà nazwà juä istnieje.
Czy na pewno chcesz usunàá tà grè?
Aby uäyá tej zawartoãci, musisz aktywowaá system.
To display this screen on a connected device, you must be connected using a component AV cable or a D-terminal AV cable and you must output the video content in progressive format.

There is no software available for this application. To use this feature, you must download application software from the website below. %1 Do you want to start the Internet browser and open this website?
Ta zawartoãá jest niedostèpna na twoim koâcie.
This game is protected. Are you sure you want to delete the game?
There is not enough free space on the Memory Stick™. At least %1 more free space is needed to update.
There is not enough free space in the system storage. At least %1 more free space is needed to update.
An error occurred during the update operation. Restart the system and perform the update again.
This game has an expire date.

After the expire date, you will no longer be able to play the game. It is recommended that you save your game progress often. You can also check the expire date during gameplay by pressing the PS button.

After the expire date, you will no longer be able to play the game. It is recommended that you save your game progress often. You can also check the expire date during gameplay by pressing the HOME button.
The expire date for this game has been reached. Do you want to extend the expire date?
This game will expire soon. Do you want to extend the expire date?
To sort by expire date, you must go to [Settings] > [Date & Time Settings] > [Date and Time], and select [Set via Internet] to set the date and time.
Delete failed. The Memory Stick™ could not be accessed.
Delete failed. The system storage could not be accessed.
If you delete this application software, the content for the software will not be deleted. To delete the content, you must use the application software.
The application software will be deleted from the Memory Stick™. Are you sure you want to continue?
The application software will be deleted from the system storage. Are you sure you want to continue?
When this application software is running, timer settings for other features will not activate even if the system is put into sleep mode.
This content has a time limit. To use the content, you must activate this system.

The version of the application software is %1.
You can check the latest version at the website listed below. %2
There is no software available for this application. To use this feature, you must download application software from the website below. %1
